jira.description:
This test plan covers comprehensive automated testing of the MLB mobile application on Android devices, validating critical user journeys from app launch to core feature completion. The automation suite tests key functionalities including user authentication, user registration, live game streaming, score updates, team/player statistics, and news feed navigation. Tests are implemented using Appium and WebDriverIO, executed in Sauce Labs using both emulators and real devices across multiple Android versions to ensure consistent user experience. The E2E scenarios simulate real user workflows such as checking game schedules, following favorite teams/players, and accessing archived game content, with validation points for UI responsiveness, data accuracy, and integration with MLB's backend services.
The test plan includes both positive and negative test cases, performance benchmarks for critical paths, and regression testing for major app updates during baseball season.
